comment.author: 29056926@N02
comment._content: There for the suffrage parade - another shot of the crowd, panned to the right a bit. Day before the inauguration.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: roketpad:  Thank you for your identifying the suffrage parade.  We will update the information and reload the description.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: This may be part of the rowdy crowd of spectators (male) who engulfed the suffrage marchers: www.loc.gov/loc/lcib/9803/suffrage.html

comment.author: 74471476@N08
comment._content: I believe the marchers are gathered at the front of the frame. (and those look like raised billy clubs in the right foreground.) This appears to have been taken before the parade has begun See: www.seeingsuffrage.com/the-book-2/the-photographs/photos-... Interesting shot because there is more than one locus of attention. Note the African American lady in the foreground and her companion.
